subspace U ⊆RD, dim(U) = M <Donto which we project the data. We
denote the projected data by ˜xn ∈U, and their coordinates (with respect
to the basis vectors b1,..., bM of U) by zn. Our aim is to ﬁnd projections
˜xn ∈RD (or equivalently the codes zn and the basis vectors b1,..., bM)
so that they are as similar to the original data xn and minimize the loss
due to compression.
